title: GNU Radio GFDM Modulator & Demodulator (gr-gfdm)
description: The *gr-gfdm* project is a Free Software Package which aims to provide an implementation of Generalized Frequency Division Multiplexing (GFDM) in the GNU Radio framework. GFDM is a more flexible alternative to OFDM.

creators.affiliation: Department of Communications Engineering, University of Bremen, Germany
creators.name: Demel, Johannes
